ai-patthana18.26:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.26:1.1_0: It’s not easy for someone to understand this states of death, conditioned by way of the teaching.
ai-patthana18.26:3.1_0: It is the condition for the deathless, not for the reckoning of the refuge. It is a condition for the calming of the teaching.
ai-patthana18.26:5.1_0: for the sake of refuge, not for the sake of refuge, nor for the object of the Dhamma, nor for the purpose of seeing its object.
ai-patthana18.26:5.1_1: for the sake of refuge, not for the sake of refuge, nor for the object of the Dhamma, nor for the purpose of seeing its object.
ai-patthana18.26:5.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana18.26:6.1_0: When there are two objects for one year, one preceding the meditation on uneven ground,
